passives.name: Spoils of War
passives.effects: Grants a charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. Melee basic attacks can consume one charge to execute minions below 240- 920 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge heals you and the nearest allied champion for 10- 60 (based on missing health) health and grants them kill gold. Healing is halved if the owner is ranged. These effects require an allied champion within 1050 units of the user.
